alert.note: Alert for Monroe; Washtenaw; Wayne (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 2:09PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Monroe, southwestern Wayne and southeastern Washtenaw Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 207 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ypsilanti to near Willis to Milan. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Willis around 215 PM EDT. Belleville and Maybee around 225 PM EDT. Carleton around 245 PM EDT. Flat Rock around 255 PM EDT. Trenton and Grosse Ile around 300 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Newport, Melvindale, Whittaker, Gibraltar, New Boston, Rockwood, Azalia, Ecorse, Scofield and Woodhaven. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
